bwwExcerpt: As in the plays's 2013 run at the Public Theater, the cast is excellent. The Alisons all shine in solo moments. Sydney Lucas, the youngest, unlocks what she's feeling when she sings "Keys." Emily Skeggs, the coed, embraces her sexuality with the delightful "Changing My Major." Beth Malone surveys th...
showScoreExcerpt:
"The show is unconventional in its subject matter and uncompromising in its intelligence and emotionality. Songs are revealing and personal — whether it’s a break-your-heart ballad (there are a few) or fantasy numbers to lift the mood...Be glad you didn’t live there. But this “Fun Home” is an unforgettable place to visit."
